channel.title: Hybrid Generators Hire | John F Hunt Power

image.title: Hybrid Generators Hire | John F Hunt Power

item.title: Powr2 Powerbank Pro
item.dc:creator: hadimarashy
item.description:
The biggest of our battery units, the Powr2, offers even more battery storage for your site.
With 90 kilowatt hours of stored energy, these units contain state-of-the-art technology and have been engineered to the highest standard. When working side by side with one of our hired diesel generators, these units can provide periods of both fuel and noise free power.
Whether you’re looking to power site cabins overnight, charge electric plant or run your security systems, we can hire you a ‘hybrid’ temporary power package to suit.
Looking to enhance the carbon credentials of your project further?
Pair one of our battery units with one of our Stage V generators or use our GreenD+ HVO fuel and reduce your environmental impact even more.

Download Spec sheet

The post Powr2 Powerbank Pro appeared first on Power.

item.title: Enerpack Battery Unit
item.dc:creator: hadimarashy
item.description:
Our Enerpack battery units are the perfect hire solution for the modern-day site. With 72 kilowatt hours of stored energy, these units feature the latest technology and have been built to the highest standard.

When working in conjunction with one of our diesel generators, these compact units provide periods of fuel free, noise free power. Whether you’re looking to power site cabins, tower crane aviation lights or security systems, we can provide a ‘hybrid’ temporary power hire package to suit.

Looking to enhance the carbon credentials of your project further?
Pair one of our battery units with one of our Stage V generators or use our GreenD+ HVO fuel and reduce your environmental impact even more.

Download Spec sheet

The post Enerpack Battery Unit appeared first on Power.
